SELECT chatroom_id AS chatroomId, user_a_id AS userAId, user_b_id AS userBId, (SELECT usernick FROM member WHERE user_id = user_a_id) AS userANick, (SELECT usernick FROM member WHERE user_id = user_b_id) AS userBNick FROM chatroom WHERE (user_a_id = #{userId} or user_b_id = #{userId}) AND (SELECT COUNT(message_id) FROM message WHERE (message_sender = user_a_id AND message_receiver = user_b_id) OR (message_sender = user_b_id AND message_receiver = user_a_id)) > 0;
